code:
%% Connection flowchart
flowchart TD
  subgraph Client[Client]
    C1[Start]
    C2[REQ_LOGIN]
    C3[Send_UDP]
    C4[Keepalive]
    C5[Outgoing_Packets]
  end

  subgraph Server[Server]
    S1[Recv_Validate_Magic]
    S2{Is REQ_LOGIN?}
    S3[ProcessLogin]
    S4[RES_LOGIN]
    S5[RateLimits]
    S6[IdleTimeout]
  end

  C1 --> C2 --> C3 --> S1
  S1 -->|invalid| Drop[Drop packet]
  S1 --> S2
  S2 -- yes --> S3 --> S4 --> C5
  S2 -- no --> S5

  C5 -- piggyback --> S1
  C5 -- no_outgoing --> ExplicitACK[Explicit_ACK] --> S1
  C4 --> C3

  S6 --> Close[Session Closed]
